item.title: My First Journal Entry
item.description:
This is my personal journal space - a place for thoughts, reflections, and ideas that don’t fit into structured blog posts.

Why I Started This Journal

I wanted a space separate from my technical blog where I could:

  • Write freely without worrying about structure
  • Document personal growth and learning
  • Reflect on daily experiences
  • Capture random thoughts and ideas

Today’s Thoughts

This is where you write your personal thoughts…

Note: Journal entries are more personal and less polished than blog posts. They’re meant to be authentic snapshots of my thinking at a particular moment.

item.title: GitHub Actions: From Zero to Hero - A Complete Tutorial
item.description:
GitHub Actions is like having a robot assistant that automatically does tasks for you whenever something happens in your GitHub repository. This tutorial will take you from complete beginner to advanced user, putting you ahead of 90% of developers.

Table of Contents

  1. What is GitHub Actions? (ELI5)
  2. Core Concepts
  3. Your First Workflow
  4. Intermediate Techniques
  5. Advanced Patterns
  6. Real-World Examples
  7. Pro Tips & Best Practices
  8. Useful Resources

What is GitHub Actions? (ELI5)

item.description: Welcome to my new blog! This is the first post.
